text: In `fetch_harvard_oxford`, we look for a path in `FSL_DIR`. We should also look into defautl fixed paths for all systems (eg /usr/share/fsl/data).
title: Explore system paths in fetch_harvard_oxford
clean_text: In look path We also look defautl fix path system eg usrsharefsldata

text:
Have we not addressed this issue in
https://github.com/nilearn/nilearn/blame/master/nilearn/datasets.py#L1569
?
No because FSL_DIR is not set by default on most setup. Thus we should explore some hardcoded absolute paths.
